# Abridged Valid Dataset
# ==============
#
# Valid dataset from Mailgun interal tests, the Wikipedia entry titled "Email
# address", and the webpage "Comparing E-mail Address Validating Regular
# Expressions" [1][2].
#
# [1] http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Email_address
# [2] http://fightingforalostcause.net/misc/2006/compare-email-regex.php
#
niceandsimple
very.common
a.little.lengthy.but.fine
disposable.style.email.with+symbol
"much.more unusual"
"very.unusual.@.unusual.com"
"very.(),:;<>[]\".VERY.\"very@\\ \"very\".unusual"
!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{}|~
"()<>[]:,;@\\\"!#$%&'*+-/=?^_`{}| ~.a"
" "
##########
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
01234567890
&'*+-./=?^_{}~
mixed-1234-in-{+^}-local
single-character-in-sld
letters-in-sld
punycode-numbers-in-tld
"quoted"
"\e\s\c\a\p\e\d"
"escaped\"quote"
"back\slash"
"tom+[a]"
OnlineDoctorateraJZPjKgUGVRRRLYCH`
Government.Grants
addr_12+3
addr_123
addr
my|'`!#_~%$&{}?^+-*
bc=some
bc=some+more
bc=some+more-and.more
Joe
unsub+ba5df.24d-no_reply-alex=gmail.com
bounce+e4f6b7.187-auth-verifier=posrt25.com
1234567890123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678901234
"first\"last"
"test\blah"
a
test
"first\last"
first.last
"Fred\ Bloggs"
bob
user+mailbox
uncommon-tld
country-code-tld
local
customer/department=shipping
$A12345
!def!xyz%abc
"Joe.\Blow"
"Fred Bloggs"
_somename
dclo
peter.piper
"Doug \"Ace\" L."
TEST
1234567890
test+test
test-test
t*est
+1~1+
{_test_}
"[[ test ]]"
test.test
"test.test"
"test\test"
"test\"blah"
customer/department
_Yosemite.Sam
~
Ima.Fool
"Ima.Fool"
"Ima Fool"
"first.middle.last"
"first..last"
"first\\\"last"
"test blah"
name.lastname

"hello my name is"
"Test \"Fail\" Ing"

foobar
"Joe\Blow"
user%uucp!path
cdburgess+!#$%&'*-/=?+_{}|~test
"Abc@def"
"Abc\@def"
"test@test"
"Austin@Powers"
"Abc@def"

"first@last"
